categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order organizations

nodes.text: Motivation was a section of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order's Sub-Adult Group that dealt with members who failed to live up to tenets of the New Order. Motivations goal was to modify their behavior and turn them into citizens useful to the Galactic Empire. Motivation reported a staggering success rate, but the results were a five-fold exaggeration of the true figure. However, their reputation for ensuring that no troublemakers were released before had proven themselves to be useful to the New Order was well deserved.
